answers.answer: I get pain down my arm and jaw pain sometimes too.  However, I do have gallbladder issues-need to have it taken out.  Stress and anxiety can cause this in all sincerity.  But I have a cousin who also suffers with gallbladder issue too and she gets the exact pain you are talking about.  You don't have to have gallstones for there to be a problem, it could just be the gallbladder isn't contracting properly.  This is a long shot, I just thought it ws worth mentioning.Anxiety can REALLY do a number on you to where you swear you are dying-I know.No acid reflux huh?  My chest pain has pretty much gone away since I was diagnosed with GERD and take aciphex, but I still get jaw pain and arm pain.

question: I am a 32 year old male. In march I have some chest pain with hart palpitations. I went to the amergency room and I had an ekg and blood work and every thing was normal. Dr said it could be acid reflux. After this I started having lots of fear of having a hart problem. Weeks later I started having hart palpitations and lots of fear. Ones again I went to the ER and they did more blood work and ekg,everythin came back normal. My doctor had me see a cardiologist. I had a stress test and a hart ultrasound. And the candiologist said that everithing look good that my hart was ok,he said that i had a mield MVP, but that it was so small that I should not feal any simptoms. After that visit with the cardiologist I keeped having chest pains lots of strees and panic attacks.I have gone to the ER 4 times and to insta care 3 times and every time they cant find enything wrong. I have had a total of 7 ekg,stres test with ultrasound, I had an endoscopy to check my stomach an ultrasound to check for gall stones lots of blood tests and they have all came back normal.I dont have high cholesteral or diabetes I am 5'7, 154 lbs no family History af hart problems. I did weight 177lbs wen all this started i lost about 27lbs.Dr said it was becouse of the anxiety and stress.I play sports and I dont feal any pain. Now i still get chest pain daily in the center and some times down my left arm my jaw herts. The pain can last for a few minutes or for a few hours. I dont feal sick besides tha pains. I do feal lots of fear and depresion.I only feal the pain wen I am doing nothing. I take paxil xanax and prilosec. But they dont help. I have seen 3 diferent doctors and they say it's anxiety.Can anxiety couse chest pain that can last for hours and give me pain down my let arm.Thank you and I hope you can help
title: anxiety pains
